elements.name: Bob wants to login to ZAC
Bob wants to log out of the application after being logged in

steps.name: "Bob" clicks on element with accessibility label: "Gebruikers profiel"
"Bob" sees the text: "Sign in to your account"

elements.name: Bob logs back in

steps.name: "Bob" sees the text: "Sign in to your account"

elements.name: Bob wants to log out of the application after being logged in

steps.name: "Bob" clicks on element with accessibility label: "Gebruikers profiel"
"Bob" sees the text: "Sign in to your account"

elements.name: Bob logs back in

steps.name: "Bob" sees the text: "Sign in to your account"

elements.name: Bob wants to create a new zaak

steps.name: "Bob" wants to create a new "CMMN" zaak
"Bob" sees the indication that no acknowledgment has been sent

elements.name: Resident fills in indienen-aansprakelijkheid-behandelen open-forms form

steps.name: Resident "Alice" fills in the indienen-aansprakelijkheid-behandelen open-forms form
Employee "Bob" clicks on the first zaak in the zaak-werkvoorraad with delay
Employee "Bob" sees the zaak that "Alice" created in open-forms

elements.name: Employee wants to create a new document for a zaak Using the SmartDocuments wizard

steps.name: "Bob" wants to create a new "CMMN" zaak
Employee "Bob" clicks on Create Document button for the new zaak
Employee "Bob" enters and submits the form to start the SmartDocuments wizard
Employee "Bob" closes the wizard result page
Employee "Bob" sees all added details in the created document meta data

elements.name: Employee "Bob" does not have enough information to finish Intake and assigns a task to Employee "Oscar"

steps.name: Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak with status "Intake"
Employee "Bob" does not have enough information to finish Intake and assigns a task to Employee "Oscar"
Employee "Oscar" sees the task assigned to them by Employee "Bob" in my task list
Employee "Oscar" is on the newly created zaak with status "Wacht op aanvullende informatie"
Employee "Oscar" sees the task assigned to them by Employee "Bob" in the newly created zaak tasks list

elements.name: Bob distributes zaken to a group and user

steps.name: "Bob" distributes the zaken to the first group and user available
"Bob" gets a message confirming that the distribution of zaken is starting
after a while the snackbar disappears

elements.name: Bob releases zaken

steps.name: the page is done searching and reloaded
"Bob" gets a message confirming that the releasement of zaken is starting
after a while the snackbar disappears

elements.name: Bob distributes taken to a group and user

steps.name: "Bob" distributes the taken to the first group and user available
"Bob" gets a message confirming that the distribution of taken is starting
after a while the snackbar disappears

elements.name: Bob releases taken

steps.name: the page is done searching and reloaded
"Bob" gets a message confirming that the releasement of taken is starting
after a while the snackbar disappears

elements.name: Bob wants to view a person
Bob wants to create a new BPMN zaak

steps.name: "Bob" wants to create a new "BPMN" zaak
"Bob" sees the indication that no acknowledgment has been sent

elements.name: Bob opens the initial task form

steps.name: Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak
"Bob" sees the form associated with the task

elements.name: Bob creates two SmartDocuments Word files

steps.name: Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak
"Bob" creates a SmartDocuments Word file named "file A"
"Bob" sees document "file A" in the documents list
"Bob" creates a SmartDocuments Word file named "file B"
"Bob" sees document "file B" in the documents list

elements.name: Bob fills-in and submits the task form

steps.name: Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak
"Bob" sees the desired form fields values
Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak
"Bob" sees that the initial task is completed
"Bob" sees that the summary task is started

elements.name: Bob inspects the summary task form

steps.name: Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak with status "In behandeling"
"Bob" sees that the summary form contains all filled-in data

elements.name: Bob confirms the data in the summary form

steps.name: Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak
"Bob" confirms the data in the form
Employee "Bob" is on the newly created zaak with status "Afgerond"
"Bob" sees the zaak result is set to "Verleend"
